metadata.title: CVE-2023-7216 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A path traversal vulnerability was found in the CPIO utility. This issuecould allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to trick a user into openinga specially crafted archive. During the extraction process, the archivercould follow symlinks outside of the intended directory, this allowswriting files in arbitrary directories through symlinks.

criterions.comment: cpio package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-04-26').
